arm_group.arm_group_label: spinal arthrodesis procedures at Ohio State University

brief_summary.textblock: To collect and organize data into a repository for future research.

detailed_description.textblock:
To collect and organize data into a repository from the Principal Investigator's (H. Francis
      Farhadi, MD, PhD) patients who are undergoing spinal arthrodesis procedures at Ohio State
      University for future research, as yet to be identified. This comprehensive database of
      patients will allow for gathering of relevant information for potential future research use.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Must have had a Spinal arthrodesis

               -  Must have spinal arthrodesis surgery

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  N/A

study_pop.textblock:
Spinal arthrodesis can be performed through either anterior, posterior, or lateral
        approaches for a variety of traumatic, degenerative, or deformity conditions.

clinical_study.official_title: OSU Comprehensive Spine Center General Spinal Arthrodesis Database

primary_outcome.description: Collecting clinical measurements.  Examples of these clinical measurements are the SF36 and the Pain Scale
primary_outcome.measure: clinical prospective review- Prospective Database study for future studies

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
